# ULAM iOS SDK 
This repository serves as the podspec repository to distribuite the ULAM iOS SDKs - the in-house ad tech and mediation solution for the Miniclip Group.
The UlamSDK is a powerful advertisement tool that facilitates integration of different Ad networks into an application. It allows for fetching, initializing, and managing various ad configurations and enables support to display ads in games. The currently supported ad formats are Interstitial and Rewarded Video.
